page.title: 13POPULATION Pentney & Narboro
page.content:
{Narborough's population is about 1200, ages ranging from birth to 90 years. Many older people from the cities retire to Narborough and these amount to 25% of the population and about 50% would account for families including children under 18. The remaining 25% are young marrieds with no family. The majority of the population are working and middle class. Narborough has been a growing village with much building of private estates.
{Pentney's population is about 360, ages ranging from birth to 99 years. With no new building, Pentney's population remains static and is ageing with more people over the age of 40 than under. The largest group being between 40 & 60 years. Most people are either working or middle class with a few professional people.
